author: veithen
msg: Made the XMLOutputFactory/XMLStreamWriter related code in StAXUtils more symmetric with respect to the XMLInputFactory/XMLStreamReader related code. In particular, introduced a StAXWriterConfiguration API (counterpart of StAXParserConfiguration) that gives more control over the XMLOutputFactory settings.
